amendment.description: To require biometric identification information on travel documents of aliens seeking to enter the United States, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3933 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3933 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Cantwell. (consideration: CR S10384, S10394-10395) To require biometric identification information on travel documents of aliens seeking to enter the United States, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3933 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Cantwell.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3933 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
